Genasi Fire Affinity

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Genasi
Benefit: If you have resistance to fire, increase that resistance by 2. Whenever a creature makes a saving throw to end ongoing fire damage from one of your powers, that creature gets –1 penalty to the roll.

Published in Dragon Magazine 367, page(s) 14.
